dct_description_sm: Europe NUTS 2 Demographics represents areas of aggregated socioeconomic and demographic information at the NUTS 2 level for Europe. NUTS 2 units have an average population between 800,000 and 3,000,000 people. NUTS (Nomenclature des Unit√©s Territoriales Statistiques) refers to the Nomenclature of Territorial Units for Statistics.
